name: Music Macro Language Project
summary: Learn about .MMLP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Macrotune is a MML editor that specializes in the creation of "retro" style game or computer music.

description: Project created and used by Macrotune, a Music Macro Language (MML) editor; saves all of the data and settings associated with a project, which includes the author, copyright, notes, and song title; can be exported as a .WAV file.
